QuestionJSON.Question: Rory is programming a humanoid robot to get off the sofa, walk to the light switch, and turn off the lights in a room. Which of the following most closely represents the code that Rory needs to write:
QuestionJSON.Explanation: First, robot stands up so it can walk. Second, robot turns toward the light switch so it walks in the correct direction. Third, it walks right-left until it reaches the light switch. Finally, robot turns off the light.
